title: Pet Friendly, Private Balcony, Spacious Floorplans
posting_body: ['Welcome to Pleasanton Glen Apartment Homes!', 'You’ll be glad to call Pleasanton Glen your home!', 'Our unique and spacious one, two, and three-bedroom floor plans offer a variety of high-end amenities and features, and we’re pet-friendly, too.', 'In addition to impressive apartment homes, we also offer townhomes for rent.', '- Granite Countertops', '- Stainless Steel Appliances',
